faq.question: Do you develop both websites and mobile apps?
faq.answer: Yes, we specialize in developing both websites and mobile applications. Our team ensures that each project is tailored to meet your business goals, whether it’s a website, a web application, or a mobile app for iOS and Android.

faq.question: How long does it take to develop a project?
faq.answer: The development timeline varies depending on the complexity and scope of the project. Generally, websites may take anywhere from a few weeks to a few months, while mobile apps may take longer due to additional testing and platform requirements.

faq.question: What technologies do you use?
faq.answer: We use a variety of technologies depending on the project requirements. For websites, we work with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and CMS platforms like WordPress. For mobile apps, iOS (Swift) and Android (Kotlin).

faq.question: Can you redesign an existing website or app?
faq.answer: Yes, we can help redesign your website or app to give it a fresh, modern look while improving functionality. Our design team ensures a smooth transition to a new design, preserving your product's core features and aligning with your goals.

faq.question: Do you provide post-launch support?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We offer ongoing support and maintenance after your project goes live. This includes bug fixes, updates, performance monitoring, ensuring that your website or app continues to perform at its best.

faq.question: How do I get a quote for my project?
faq.answer: To receive a quote, simply get in touch with us and provide a brief overview of your project requirements. After discussing your goals and understanding the scope of the project, we’ll provide a detailed proposal with pricing estimates tailored to your needs.
